name: Colors of Me
description:
Colors of Me is an introspective scene, laid out like a children's book, and written like a poem. 

A short project that will take less than 3 minutes to finish and less than 3 hours to make, this was an expression of my inhibitions that drove my anxieties towards creating again. Both an expression of each included emotion and a forceful way to break free from them, this game has served its purpose for me and I hope it serves some purpose for you. Enjoy!
